[DQC.IFRS.0102.9543] Comprehensive income with a value of 13,100,000 is not equal to the combined total of Profit (loss) and Other comprehensive income and expense for the year ( 42,200,000 + 55,300,000 ) with a value of 97,500,000.
These values should be equal. The properties of this ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncome fact are: Period :2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : USD Decimals of Comprehensive income : 2 Decimals of Profit (loss) : 2 Decimals of Other comprehensive income and expense for the year : 2

[DQC.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 09 - Statement of financial position but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:CashAndCashEquivalents, ifrs-full:IssuedCapital, ifrs-full:Liabilities, ifrs-full:SharePremium, ifrs-full:TradeAndOtherCurrentReceivables, coats:CurrentPensionSurpluses, ifrs-full:OtherReserves, ifrs-full:NetAssetsLiabilities, ifrs-full:OtherCurrentFinancialAssets, ifrs-full:TreasuryShares, ifrs-full:RetainedEarnings, ifrs-full:CurrentAssetsLiabilities, ifrs-full:CapitalReserve, ifrs-full:Inventories, ifrs-full:ReserveOfExchangeDifferencesOnTranslation All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 17.0.2 -

[DQC.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 11 - Statement of cash flows but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:IncreaseDecreaseInCashAndCashEquivalents All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
If the item is an additional disclosure in the cash flow statement then make sure that is included as a child of DisclosureOfCashFlowStatementExplanatory or the extension abstracts SupplementalCashFlowInformationAbstract, CashFlowNoncashInvestingAndFinancingActivitiesDisclosureAbstract, NoncashInvestingAndFinancingItemsAbstract, NonCashOperatingAndFinancingActivitiesAbstract, NonCashOperatingAndInvestingActivitiesAbstract, NoncashFinancingItemsAbstract or NoncashInvestingItemsAbstract.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 17.0.2 -

[DQC.IFRS.0129.9609] It is expected that ReserveOfExchangeDifferencesOnTranslation with a value of -105,700,000 reported in the network role http://coats.com/roles/StatementOfFinancialPosition should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, Equity with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:ReserveOfExchangeDifferencesOnTranslationMember and a reported value of 105,700,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://coats.com/roles/StatementOfChangesInEquity. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:ReserveOfExchangeDifferencesOnTranslation fact are:
Period : 2021-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : USD Decimals of ReserveOfExchangeDifferencesOnTranslation : 2 Decimals of Equity : 2 Rule version: 17.0.2 - https://filings.xbrl.org/2138003SPYWGAITNFY17/2021-12-31/ESEF/GB/0/2138003SPYWGAITNFY17-2021-12-31.zip/2138003SPYWGAITNFY17-2021-12-31/reports/2138003SPYWGAITNFY17-2021-12-31-T01.xhtml 14927
